title: New lore: Runeterra map concept #2
body:
After discusion, here is the second version of the new lore map! If anything doesn't fit, please, don't hesitate to inform me!

http://i.imgur.com/iePIa7Bl.jpg

Original post: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/story-art/oEJG5qIs-new-lore-runeterra-map-concept?

replies.body:
I only have a few minutes to comment (sorry!)

--Liking the size of Ionia's continent now - much better than before.  

--The 'Serpentine River' issue is a real problem that I, and other lore fans, have wrestled with in the past.  My solution was to have two serpentine rivers.  (Which is something that happens in real life too - in the USA there are two rivers with the same name in the same _state_!  Never mind on the same planet.)

-- Shurima is a decent size too.  Good.

-- I'd look to the Freljord event map for a rough outline of that region.  Pretty sure that's at least somewhat canon.

-- Bilgewater and Shadow Isles looking pretty good, relationshipwise too.

Probably cannot comment on anything else right now, but I didn't want to see you (and the other map/geography experts here) with nothing.
I swear _something_ is in the works, but you know Riot.  We can't give you a date because it might get pushed back etc.  I know how infuriating it is, and I'm sorry.
I like to imagine you guys are paranoid about jinxing things, so everyone is required to carry a block of wood with which to touch in an effort to un-jinx themselves.

...In the glowing aftermath of my carnage, the smoldering once-mountains collapse into the molten rubble streams now flowing through the valley. This is the scar I have left upon this world.

Due to the harrowing map I think Bilgewater is closer to Piltover/Zaun and Ionia than any other City States. Simply because no other locations are marked on the Bilgewater map. That's what really confused me when I attempted to make a layout of Valoran. Piltover/Zaun and Ionia are the only places close enough to be marked down on the map. Unfortunately Information about Piltover and Zaun is almost useless as we have no geographical knowledge of what else Piltover or Zaun are near.
